nodes.text: Danzikan was the language of the Danzikan species. The Danzikan twins Lark and Jonk communicated in Danzikan while playing a game of sabacc in the Lodge on the planet Vandor in 10 BBY.

Danzikan first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was first identified as Danzikan in the video "Every Language in Star Wars" which released in 2019 on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel.
